name: Quest for Adventure: That time I worked at an Inn in the town next to the Dark Lord's Dungeon.
name_original: Quest for Adventure: That time I worked at an Inn in the town next to the Dark Lord's Dungeon.
description:
A small game set in a medieval fantasy universe.
The game is in English and it also has a computer generated Korean translation.

You can save your progress.
Progress is saved in your browser, this means saves are volatile.
I added in Settings an option that will add Import and Export buttons in the Save and Load screens. Export will let you save your game as a file, that you can load with the Import in the load screen. Be aware that these saves do not keep your gallery unlocks, those are still saved in the browser.

Thanks to my Patreon supporters that helped with the making of the game.
